pages.title: Exploration Discipline
pages.text: Never explore without markers. Use torches, pillars, or signs at branch points. When an anomaly triggers, execute the same return procedure every time: orient, mark, retreat, regroup.

pages.title: Audio Management
pages.text: Sound cues matter, but obsession kills focus. If you hear unexplained events repeatedly in one area, record coordinates and leave. Re-enter during daylight with a fresh inventory and clear objective.
